facts.title: My Journey
facts.description: From a middle-class family in Kolhapur, Maharashtra, I dreamed of becoming a Pokemon master, WWE wrestler, poet, and engineer before settling on a career as a scientist.

facts.title: Multilingual
facts.description: Proficient in Marathi, Hindi, and English, I have formally studied Sanskrit and Russian, with the ability to understand Bangla.

facts.title: Advocate for Open Source
facts.description: I firmly support open-source initiatives and promote an ad-free internet for a better online experience.

facts.title: Passion for Board Games
facts.description: I find joy in playing and even designing board games, a hobby that flourished during my PhD.

facts.title: Social Impact
facts.description: Engaging in social work, I've taught underprivileged orphans, donated to cancer research, and supported underfunded schools, believing education and research can improve various aspects of human life.

facts.title: Open to Collaboration
facts.description: Always ready for new projects, art, challenges, and collaborations, I'm open to exploring diverse opportunities.

facts.title: Travel Adventures
facts.description: Thanks to my wife, Pritha, I now enjoy traveling and going on long drives together.
